name: Let It Out...
description:
This is a game made for the n3k challenge theme - Escape. Its also my first ever game.

You are Fred - a decent supermarket employee specializing in stocking shelves. You also have gastronomical issues.

In a split-screen setup you control Fred from the outside as well as the inside.

Controls: WASD and arrows for movement. Use mouse button to click the gas bubbles to prevent them going out of the stomach.

Your objective is to stack as many shelves as possible. Go to the stockroom and collect the brown boxes. Go to the relevant isle and repeat.

Green customers coming in contact with your gas will faint. Security guards wont though. If they suspect that you are stinking up the place - they will chase after you. So make sure you let it out discreetly.
